title: Meiosis. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: William L. Claiborne, Acorn Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Explains the processes of, and reasons for, meiosis. Stresses the importance of gamete formation for the continuation of life. Defines the role of the cell nucleus, centriole, chromosomes, chromatids and DNA in meiosis.
